document.full_text: a proposal in the senate would restrict bankruptcy filings to companies' headquarter states. but there are problems with drawing lines on where chapter 11 cases should go.
document.title: does it matter where chapter 11 bankruptcy is filed?
lines_and_colors: a proposal in the senate would restrict bankruptcy filings to companies' headquarter states. but there are problems with drawing lines on where chapter 11 cases should go.
